readingMnemonic: Once the samurai enters the <kanji>villa</kanji>, he lets his <reading>soul</reading> (そう) go. He's been fighting for long enough and this villa was always where he wanted to go.
meaningMnemonic: Clearing his <radical>flowers</radical> of <radical>icicle</radical>s, the <radical>samurai</radical> returns home to his <kanji>villa</kanji>.
